item.title: Video Editor for Academic Event Recap - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a 3-minute video recap of an academic event program. The video should also have a 30-second version suitable for social media platforms. You will be provided with footage of two panels, as well as various photos and videos. The final video should effectively capture the essence of the event and highlight the key moments. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this project.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Creativity
- Attention to detail
- Proficient in video editing software

Size: Medium
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Animated Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented animated video creator to help us make a 17-second cartoon video. The video will be used for promotional purposes and should be engaging and visually appealing. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating animated videos and a strong understanding of storytelling and visual communication.

  Responsibilities:
  - Create a 17-second cartoon video based on the given requirements
  - Collaborate with our team to develop a storyboard and script
  - Use animation software to bring the characters and scenes to life
  - Ensure that the video aligns with our brand and target audience

  Requirements:
  - Proficiency in animation software such as Adobe After Effects or Toon Boom Harmony
  - Strong artistic and storytelling skills
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Previous experience in creating animated videos is preferred

Attached is the video audio, example pictures, and audio description of the video.  Here's the video idea link: https://youtu.be/pKalAbKrhVY?si=_v9iXs0PdYeVtCSV

  If you have a passion for creating visually stunning and captivating videos, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work when applying.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:01 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Reviewer for Freelance Consulting Firm - Upwork
item.description:
We are Yoodule, a freelance consulting firm, looking for someone to create short, engaging video reviews (20 seconds max) of our services for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and TikTok ads.

Responsibilities:
1. Produce short video reviews (20 seconds max) discussing your positive experience with our services.
2. Ensure the videos are casual, authentic, and engaging.

Requirements:
1. Comfortable speaking on camera.
2. Ability to communicate naturally and enthusiastically about our services.

Application Instructions:
1. Submit a sample similiar video of yourself.
2. Selected applicants will have the opportunity to use our services for free to create their reviews.

Compensation:
1. Please include your rate with your application.

We look forward to seeing your applications!

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Marketing Strategy, Content Writing, English, Video Production, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Marketing Strategy, Content Writing, English, Video Production, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States

item.title: Freelancer required to produce 2 animated videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are a water filter business specialising in water filter installation to customer homes we need 2 videos from a freelancer, one is to explain what the customer has to do to prepare before an installation takes place and another on how the customer can maintain their water filter system.

If you are specialist in animated videos please drop us a message.

Each video should be between 30 seconds and 1 minute. There must also be voiceover in a uk or american accent.

item.title: 3D Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Unreal Engine and Blender artist to join our team and create engaging 3D explainer videos aimed at teaching students aged 14-19 years old. As a video creator, you will be responsible for transforming concepts into visually appealing and easy-to-understand animations. This role requires a strong understanding of storytelling, animation principles, and the ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in Unreal Engine and Blender
  - Strong 3D modeling and animation skills
  - Ability to create visually appealing and engaging videos
  - Knowledge of video editing and post-production techniques
  - Excellent communication and teamwork skills

  If you are passionate about education and have a creative flair for 3D animation, we would love to hear from you.

  Please provide a portfolio of your previous work showcasing your skills in Unreal Engine and Blender.

  This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months.

  Expertise Level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $19.00-$42.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:54 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Animation, Video Production, 3D Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Animation, Video Production, 3D Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled and creative video editor/social media poster to join my team and handle editing of B roll footage. The editor will be responsible for scheduling and posting the edited videos across our social media platforms, similar to the style of Iman Ghadzi etc. We are looking for someone who can edit the videos with trending sounds and create motivational captions to build my reels pages. The ideal candidate should have a strong eye for detail, excellent time management skills, and a passion for social media. If you are a video editing expert who can bring our social media content to life, we want to hear from you.

Skills:
- Video editing
- Social media management
- Trend analysis
- Strong attention to detail
- Time management

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Promotion Video / Trailer for an Audiobook (You Tube) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who can create a You Tube Video to promote an Audiobook that will be available via a Landing Page to watch / hear.
The Video should be like a Trailer for a movie. It should be fascinating.
The story is already there. The Audiobook is finished. The only issue for non- German speaking people is that it is in German and to understand the story and to be able to create the Video for You Tube it is important that you speak German. If possible references would be great. The Video can be created with AI as long as it is completely unique and as long as I have the full rights to show it on You Tube.  Looking forward to hear from you.


Budget: $70
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Trailer, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Trailer, Video Commercial
Country: Estonia

item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second


Budget: $50

Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, Video Production, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Video Ad, Product Ad Campaign
